title: Pixel 3 Group messages defaulting back to Mass Text instead of Group MMS
content:
Description: 
Pixel 3
Android Version: 10 
Provider: Project Fi

My group messages keep defaulting to Mass Text instead of Group MMS. 

Steps: 
1. I am going into Settings > Advanced > Group Messaging > Group MMS. 

Result: 
Settings will default or 'timeout' back to mass text instead of Group mms. 

Expected Result: 
 Should Keep settings change. 

P.S. (additional suggestions) 
1. It would be helpful to have an 'apply' or 'done' button when selecting a group setting, so that the pop up screen goes away. This will also help ensure that the setting changes have been made. A button adds to the user experience and gives them peace of mind that their changes have been saved. 

2. Default should be group mms since I can't think of a reason you would want to send mass texts in a singular fashion. I get that some users use this feature, but I can only see it hindering some from using this default app because of the inconvenience of getting group messages one txt at a time, instead of as one mass txt.
